programmes.show_description: When a DEA agent returns home from a botched mission to recover, he has to save his family from a violent criminal and his gang who has invaded his home. Starring Michael Jai White (2022)
(2020) Thriller starring Aubrey Reynolds. Meeting the parents becomes more of an ordeal than normal when a woman is thrown into drama surrounding the death of a family member.
Fly with the pilots and intensive care paramedics of The Westpac Lifesaver Rescue Helicopter Service who provide emergency medical treatment and assistance to those in life-threatening situations.

A daughter is embarrassed by her angry father, a grandmother is not allowed to travel with her oxygen canisters, and a delighted couple return home after adopting their baby daughter.
A bride-to-be is refused permission to fly for being too drunk, two Southwest pilots elope to Las Vegas to get married, and a bridal gown fails to make it home in one piece.
A blizzard threatens to ruin a newlywed couple's honeymoon, and a customer service supervisor tries to defuse a heated argument between two passengers at check-in.
A passenger faces the prospect of missing his son's operation after missing his flight, and an electrical failure causes a blackout onboard a grounded plane.
A couple of unusual passengers are causing excitement on a flight to Chicago's Sea World, and a man dressed as a tiger causes intrigue on the ground in Chicago.
There is frustration for the Airline staff as passengers turn up late and irate, and a passenger faces an anxious wait as she tries to get to her dying mother in time.

programmes.show_name: A Reason To Live, A Reason To Die
programmes.show_description: (1972) Western with James Coburn and Telly Savalas. Branded a coward for surrendering his fort to the Confederates, a Union colonel recruits seven condemned men for a daring mission to recapture it.
Twenty years after a gang of outlaws fail to rob a gold train, the leader tries the same robbery.
(2008) Western with Luke Perry, C. Thomas Howell and Kim Coates. After killing an innocent man, an ex-lawman on a quest for revenge makes a pledge that takes him straight into the path of his prey.
(1958) Western starring Alan Ladd. A soldier returns home after the Civil War to find his wife dead and his son shocked into silence. He rides out, determined to find both a cure and justice.
(1955) Classic western with Randolph Scott and Forrest Tucker. When the notorious Reno Brothers start rampaging through the west, a special agent is sent to bring them to justice.
(1943) Classic western starring John Wayne. A tough cowboy and rich oil baron fight for power, land and love in 1900s Oklahoma. Who will triumph in this explosive battle of wills?
(1971) Comedy western with Lee Van Cleef and James Mason. It's a wild ride of bank robbing, wife swapping and double crossing as two rivals team up to steal a million bucks from the government.
(2019) Edge-of-your-seat thriller starring Thomas Gibson. A rogue NSA agent joins an elite group of Native American trackers to stop terrorists crossing the US border. Also starring Louise Lombard.
(2018) Drama with Jason Sudeikis. The rise and fall of auto-mogul John DeLorean, told through his friendship with FBI informant Jim Hoffman - proving that even the fastest cars can hit dead ends.

When a former co-host works his way back into the life of popular TV host Naomi Spencer, the show's success skyrockets, but Naomi's personal life begins to fall apart. Starring Chrishell Stause (2019)
(2016) War drama with Jai Courtney, Lily James and Christopher Plummer. A German soldier falls for a Jewish maid while investigating the exiled Kaiser. Will he honour his country or follow his heart?

Two unaccompanied minors are close to boarding the wrong flight, and team members audition for the staff holiday cabaret - with the winners performing for passengers at the departure gates.
Staff have to handle a drunken passenger at 7am in the morning, stormy weather causes severe delays, and a supervisor has to inform a customer that he is too big for a plane seat.
Anita tells an angry family that they must buy an extra plane ticket for their toddler, and a passenger supervisor tries to calm a nervous flyer in Los Angeles.
The largest blackout in US history causes chaos to air travel with flight delays, cancellations and airports filled with increasingly angry stranded passengers.
A Southwest pilot is set to retire after 30 years of service, and it is the end of an era for Chicago's Terminal F.
Manager Colleen's patience is tested to the limit by a rowdy group of BMX bikers, a boy takes his first unaccompanied flight, and a stressed mum and her two kids miss their flight in Chicago.
Supervisor Mike Carr turns detective as he tries to solve the mystery of a missing ticket, and a passenger travels to LA to fulfil her lifelong dream to be a contestant on The Price is Right.
A customer changes her clothes in full sight of her fellow passengers, the police are called to assist with a group of drunk women, and in Chicago, it is 70's day at the airport.
(2006) Captivating drama with Sarah Wynter. The lonely wife of a prison warden falls for an inmate she believes is innocent and helps him escape, only to make a shocking discovery about his motives.
A troubled young man hijacks a bus load of school children. Meanwhile Detective Amber Cross (Alaina Huffman), battling with her own  demons and issues, is called in to negotiate

(2020) Psychological thriller with Alex McKenna. A woman gets engaged to a man with a young daughter, but their happiness is threatened by the girl's biological mother, who resorts to deadly measures.

(2017) Baby-napping thriller with Kaitlyn Black. After his wife dies in a car crash and their newborn disappears, Brian comes to a shocking realisation - that someone they know would kill for a baby..
(2021) Thriller with Brittany Underwood. On her wedding day, Leah is kidnapped by her fianc√©'s ex-girlfriend. But is it obsession, or a desperate attempt to protect her from a hidden danger?
(2021) Tense psychological thriller with Annika Foster. A woman falls for a handsome firefighter who saves her life, but soon discovers that his overprotective nature can get obsessive - and deadly.

(2012) Thriller with Rhona Mitra. Still haunted by a failed negotiation, a psychologist is thrust back into high-stakes action when her sister is taken hostage, forcing her to face her greatest fears.
A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake. Starring J.K Simmons (2017).
(2017) Action thriller starring Dominic Cooper. A rogue Russian operative plots to unleash deadly biochemical weapons. Special Boat Service commando John Stratton is sent in to hunt him down.
